mapper.insert: INSERT into article ( id, article_dir_id, author_id, article_type, title, content, privilege, key_words, discuss_type, create_time, update_time, update_times, view_times, effective) values ( #{id}, #{articleDirId}, #{authorId}, #{articleType}, #{title}, #{content}, #{privilege}, #{keyWords}, #{discussType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{updateTimes}, #{viewTimes}, #{effective})
mapper.update:
update article set
id = #{ id} ,
article_dir_id = #{ articleDirId} ,
author_id = #{ authorId} ,
article_type = #{ articleType} ,
title = #{ title} ,
content = #{ content} ,
privilege = #{ privilege} ,
key_words = #{ keyWords} ,
discuss_type = #{ discussType} ,
create_time = #{ createTime} ,
update_time = #{ updateTime} ,
update_times = #{ updateTimes} ,
view_times = #{ viewTimes} ,
effective = #{ effective}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, article_dir_id, author_id, article_type, title, content, privilege, key_words, discuss_type, create_time, update_time, update_times, view_times, effective from article where id =#{id}

select id, article_dir_id, author_id, article_type, title, content, privilege, key_words, discuss_type, create_time, update_time, update_times, view_times, effective from article where id IN
#{id}
